attributes.action: review the confiscation of Bradford and Bingley bonds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bonds or PIBs of Bradford and Bingley Plc should be treated the same in all respects as those of Northern Rock. Otherwise holders are being discrimated against

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
